${ModID}:BlazingSpark.NAME: Blazing Spark
${ModID}:BlazingSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:TreasureClaw.NAME: Treasure Claw
${ModID}:TreasureClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.

${ModID}:MassiveClaw.NAME: Massive Claw
${ModID}:MassiveClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every !${ModID}:m2! cards in your deck.

${ModID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${ModID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:Outscale.NAME: Outscale
${ModID}:Outscale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase the Block of ALL Outscale cards by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:LetThemCome.NAME: Let Them Come!
${ModID}:LetThemCome.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:BlazingScales.NAME: Blazing Scales
${ModID}:BlazingScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:TreasureScale.NAME: Treasure Scale
${ModID}:TreasureScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.

${ModID}:MassiveScale.NAME: Massive Scale
${ModID}:MassiveScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for every !${ModID}:m2! cards in your deck.

${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.NAME: Profane Spark
${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak.  NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:ToxicSpark.NAME: Toxic Spark
${ModID}:ToxicSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:ToxicSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison.  NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:SwiftSpark.NAME: Swift Spark
${ModID}:SwiftSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card.
${ModID}:SwiftSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:BarrageSpark.NAME: Barrage Spark
${ModID}:BarrageSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:BarrageSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:PureSpark.NAME: Pure Spark
${ModID}:PureSpark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:PureSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:RadiantSpark.NAME: Radiant Spark
${ModID}:RadiantSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:RadiantSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E]. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E][E]. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:FocusedSpark.NAME: Focused Spark
${ModID}:FocusedSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.NAME: Crystalline Spark
${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.
${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:PridefulClaw.NAME: Prideful Claw
${ModID}:PridefulClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every Rare card in your deck.

${ModID}:Armorfryer.NAME: Armorfryer
${ModID}:Armorfryer.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TreasureMind.NAME: Treasure Mind
${ModID}:TreasureMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.
${ModID}:TreasureMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Gems into your hand.

${ModID}:TakeFlight.NAME: Take Flight
${ModID}:TakeFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Buffer at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:CrashLanding.NAME: Crash Landing
${ModID}:CrashLanding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. At the end of your turn, ALL characters take !D! damage.

${ModID}:PridefulScale.NAME: Prideful Scale
${ModID}:PridefulScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for every Rare card in your deck.

${ModID}:Kindle.NAME: Kindle
${ModID}:Kindle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:DraconicWrath.NAME: Draconic Wrath
${ModID}:DraconicWrath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Rage and !M! Flame Barrier for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:HoardingInstinct.NAME: Hoarding Instinct
${ModID}:HoardingInstinct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.

${ModID}:BurningTemper.NAME: Burning Temper
${ModID}:BurningTemper.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add a random ${ModID}:Spark into your hand for each card discarded.
${ModID}:BurningTemper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add a random ${ModID}:Spark+ into your hand for each card discarded.

${ModID}:FrightfulPresence.NAME: Frightful Presence
${ModID}:FrightfulPresence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${ModID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Play all Spark cards in your Hand, Draw Pile, and Discard Pile and Exhaust them. NL Then, add Infernal Breath into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Inferno.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play all Spark cards in your Hand, Draw Pile, and Discard Pile and Exhaust them. NL Then, add Infernal Breath+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All my Sparks are Breaths because I have too much Ember.

${ModID}:InfernalBreath.NAME: Infernal Breath
${ModID}:InfernalBreath.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ComfyNest.NAME: Comfy Nest
${ModID}:ComfyNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember for each [E] at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:ComfyNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember for each [E] at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:DesertNest.NAME: Desert Nest
${ModID}:DesertNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Strength for each [E] at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:DesertNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! temporary Strength. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Strength for each [E] at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:ForestNest.NAME: Forest Nest
${ModID}:ForestNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Dexterity at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:ForestNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! temporary Dexterity. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Dexterity at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:OceanNest.NAME: Ocean Nest
${ModID}:OceanNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, draw !M! card at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:OceanNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, draw !M! card at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:TundraNest.NAME: Tundra Nest
${ModID}:TundraNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:TundraNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:AbyssNest.NAME: Abyss Nest
${ModID}:AbyssNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:AbyssNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Metallicize. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:AncientNest.NAME: Ancient Nest
${ModID}:AncientNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Artifact at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:AncientNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Artifact at the start of your next turn. for each [E]

${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.NAME: Heavenly Nest
${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain [E] at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] next turn. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain [E] at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:VolcanicNest.NAME: Volcanic Nest
${ModID}:VolcanicNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Demon Form at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:VolcanicNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Demon Form. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Demon Form at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:NestingForm.NAME: Nesting Form
${ModID}:NestingForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random ${ModID}:Nest into your hand.

${ModID}:Amethyst.NAME: Amethyst
${ModID}:Amethyst.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Garnet.NAME: Garnet
${ModID}:Garnet.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
